description:
##BitTorrent Sync (BTSync) has been rebranded as Resilio Sync and thus deprecated.


**The package(s) you seek are here:**
[https://chocolatey.org/packages/resilio-sync-home](https://chocolatey.org/packages/resilio-sync-home)
[https://chocolatey.org/packages/resilio-sync-business](https://chocolatey.org/packages/resilio-sync-business)

###The btsync package now defaults to the Resilio Sync HOME version as a dependency.
author: BitTorrent Inc.
